mdRecord.dcterms:title: Salem Fire Fighters B Platoon, April 1973
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Salem Fire Fighters B Platoon, April 1973, Members in the photo include: Eric Miller in the back row first on the left, Captain Ron Milton in the back row fourth from the left, Captain Crotch furthest to the right, Steve Ford in the front row second from the left, Johnny Hicks in the front row third from the left, and Chapman Williams in the front row furthest to the right.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
